Review Text: Soup is a little bit salty. If adding some chips of bread on it, it could be better. The lamb smells good and tasty. The waiter service is good.

Review Text:

Name: Roberto's Restaurant
Review Text: Very good service! The place has a good atmosphere and is well designed. The food however wasn't spectacular. We went for brunch, the fried fish with salsa Verde was very nice together with the other appetizers there where 2 pastas served, ‚Ä¶

Name: Roberto's Restaurant
Review Text: A decent traditional, authentic Italian restaurant. Highly professional staff. There is nothing wrong with the restaurant. But compared to the current offering of restaurants in Amsterdam,  also nothing that makes it memorable enough to justify the high price.

Name: Roberto's Restaurant
Review Text: Ordered the chicken with a side of spinach, both very very salty, so they made me the pasta which a bit better because it was basically dipped in butter. They still charged me for the chicken and side dish. Had to go to straight up to my hotel room and clean my teeth and i might clean them again. At least the waiter was nice.

Name: Roberto's Restaurant
Review Text: I had never imagined that I'll find such a great Italian restaurant in the Netherlands and of course not in a hotel! However Roberto's is quite popular and for a reason - the pasta was nicely cooked and the wine selection - exceptional. I should also mention the charming interior - truly elegant and in European style.

Review Text:
Nice Italian food.
The lobster was awesome.

Name: Roberto's Restaurant
Review Text: Pasta the first night and beef fillet the second. Service was immaculately professional and food delectable. I do not easily rate 5 stars but this place truely deserves it.

Review Text: It was good to be there ..they treat us very good ,the birsteca fiorentina was amazing! We celebrate our 6 year wedding anniversary and yes succeed!!!!
